title: Happier With Gretchen Rubin:  A Very Special Episode (All About You)
description:
Ep. 20: Listen to listeners! We hear answers to the question, "If you could change one aspect of a relationship, what would you change?" and people's demerits and gold stars.  Want to get in touch? @gretchenrubin; @elizabethcraft; podcast@gretchenrubin.com; happiercast.com/20; 774-277-9336.
 
To learn more about listener data and our privacy practices visit: https://www.audacyinc.com/privacy-policy
  
 Learn more about your ad choices. Visit https://podcastchoices.com/adchoices
itunes:author: Gretchen Rubin / The Onward Project
itunes:subtitle: Very Special Episode! Featuring Great Comments from Our Listeners.
